ml2en.js
=======
This work is licensed under GNU GPL v2
Kailash Nadh, 2012

Convert Malayalam text to Manglish !

"എന്റെ മലയാളം" -> "ente malayalam"

Play Store - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=subins2000.manglish

F-Droid - https://www.f-droid.org/en/packages/subins2000.manglish/
Convert Malayalam text in all apps to Manglish

Enabling this will display an on screen overlay button. When clicking, it will convert every Malayalam text on screen to Manglish. It won\'t work in some apps though.\n\nFor Android 10 and above, go to \"Installed Services\" to enable it.
Support and help maintain this project. Feedback welcome :)
